_header: In this world is nothing else
_description: There is nothing but anguish and pain in this world — one couple

HunHM139.Transcription:
In thys warlde ys no thyng ellysBott angguis and pene and no
                        thyngg eleys as men telles
HunHM139.Note:
Added to mostly blank column by a hand of the sixteenth century,
                    signed(?) John Wyldon.
